issue.title: [R] Ignore .Rhistory files in source control
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6591](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6591). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While working on ARROW-6337, I saw that .Rhistory files are not currently ignored in Arrow's .gitignore. They serve no purpose to the project so I think they should probably be ignored.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6591?focusedCommentId=16933388) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5415
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5415>
